mapper.select: SELECT B.TASK_SN, B.TASK_NM, B.TASK_CN, b.task_presentn_tmlmt, B.TASK_DE, b.atchmnfl_id FROM ESTBL_COURS A, TASK B, STDNT C, ATNLC_LCTRE D WHERE a.estbl_cours_cd = b.estbl_cours_cd AND a.estbl_cours_cd = d.estbl_cours_cd AND d.mber_no = c.mber_no AND c.mber_no = #{mberNo} AND a.estbl_cours_cd = #{estblCoursCd}

SELECT B.MBER_NO, A.MBER_NM, E.MAJOR_NM_KR, B.GRADE, D.ESTBL_COURS_CD FROM MBER A, STDNT B, ATNLC_LCTRE C, ESTBL_COURS D, MAJOR E WHERE A.MBER_NO = B.MBER_NO AND B.MBER_NO = C.MBER_NO AND C.ESTBL_COURS_CD = D.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND B.MAJOR_CODE = E.MAJOR_CODE AND D.ESTBL_COURS_CD = #{estblcoursCd}
SELECT A.MBER_NO, A.TASK_SN, A.ATCHMNFL_ID FROM PRESENTN A, TASK B, ESTBL_COURS C WHERE C.ESTBL_COURS_CD = B.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND B.TASK_SN = A.TASK_SN AND A.TASK_SN = #{taskSn}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASK(TASK_SN, TASK_NM, TASK_CN, TASK_PRESENTN_TMLMT, TASK_DE,ATCHMNFL_ID,ESTBL_COURS_CD) VALUES(SEQ_TASK.nextval, #{taskNm}, #{taskCn}, #{taskPresentnTmlmt}, #{taskDe}, #{atchmnflId}, #{estblCoursCd})

INSERT INTO PRESENTN(MBER_NO, TASK_SN, PRESENTN_SJ, PRESENTN_CN, PRESENTN_DATE, TASK_SCORE, ATCHMNFL_ID) VALUES(#{mberNo},#{taskSn},#{presentnSj},#{presentnCn},#{presentnDate},#{taskScore},#{atchmnflId})
